name: Bandcamp: Stick Track List & Description to Player
description: Moves album variations and merchandise down so playlist or track description appears right below player.  Also moves discography in the sidebar up below band info.
additional_info:
Obviously not wanting to prevent purchases or hurt Bandcamp (I really *love* the service!), but user experience of separated player and track-list or huge amount of "merchannoise" above valuable page elements was so terrible for me I had to make this adjustments.

Albums used in screenshots (buy them! :])
http://glorierock.com/album/glorie
https://kakiking.bandcamp.com/album/junior
https://welostthesea.bandcamp.com/

Changelog
2016-01-24 made global to make it work with any branded BC page out there. (Broke categorization here.)
2016-01-28 fixed categorization here preserving global nature, wohoo.
2016-04-19 added rearrangement also for discography in sidebar. Changed screenshots.
